he might disappear again soon.\""},{"lineNumber":154762,"originalJapaneseLine":"「おい、そっちに魔物が向かったぞー！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hey, monsters are heading that way!\""},{"lineNumber":154763,"originalJapaneseLine":"「な、なんだって！？","translatedEnglishLine":"\"W-What!?\""},{"lineNumber":154764,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ここにはまだ動けない者も沢山いるのに……！」","translatedEnglishLine":"There are still many people here who can't move...!\""},{"lineNumber":154765,"originalJapaneseLine":"「戦線突破されたかな？","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Did they break through the front line?"},{"lineNumber":154766,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ま、関係ないし俺は行く」","translatedEnglishLine":"Well, doesn't matter, I'm going.\""},{"lineNumber":154767,"originalJapaneseLine":"「そ、そんなわけにはいかないだすよ、ランス様！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Th-That can't be allowed, Lord Rance!\""},{"lineNumber":154768,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ひゃあ、もう来るよー！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Eek, here they come already!\""},{"lineNumber":154769,"originalJapaneseLine":"「えーい、どこだどこだ、シルキィちゃん！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hey, where are you, Silky-chan!\""},{"lineNumber":154770,"originalJapaneseLine":"「さっきの兵の言ってる場所に来たのに、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"We came to the place the soldier mentioned,"},{"lineNumber":154771,"originalJapaneseLine":"　混戦状態で分からんな」","translatedEnglishLine":"but it's a chaotic battle, so I can't tell.\""},{"lineNumber":154772,"originalJapaneseLine":"「もうどこかに移動したんでしょうか……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Maybe he moved somewhere else already...\""},{"lineNumber":154773,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ちっ、これじゃあ、見つけることなんて……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Tch, at this rate, there's no way to find him...\""},{"lineNumber":154774,"originalJapaneseLine":"「シルキィ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Silky...\""},{"lineNumber":154775,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ん？　向こうが騒がしいな、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hm? It's noisy over there,"},{"lineNumber":154776,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ちょっと行ってみるか」","translatedEnglishLine":"let's go check it out.\""},{"lineNumber":154777,"originalJapaneseLine":"――と、ランスが顔を向けた瞬間。","translatedEnglishLine":"—At the moment Rance turned his face."},{"lineNumber":154778,"originalJapaneseLine":"土煙の中から甲冑の塊が現れた。","translatedEnglishLine":"A mass of armored figures emerged from the dust cloud."},{"lineNumber":154779,"originalJapaneseLine":"「なっ……！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Wha...!\""},{"lineNumber":154780,"originalJapaneseLine":"「え……？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Huh...?\""},{"lineNumber":154781,"originalJapaneseLine":"「先手必勝！　死ねェー！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Strike first and win! Dieee!\""},{"lineNumber":154782,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ランスあたたたーっく！」","translatedEnglishLine":"Rance, atatatack!\""},{"lineNumber":154783,"originalJapaneseLine":"「くっ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ugh!\""},{"lineNumber":154784,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランスの不意打ち気味の攻撃に","translatedEnglishLine":"Feeling something unsettling in Rance's sudden attack,"},{"lineNumber":154785,"originalJapaneseLine":"なにか不穏なものを感じたシルキィは","translatedEnglishLine":"Silky avoided by shifting his body half aside instead of blocking."},{"lineNumber":154786,"originalJapaneseLine":"受けずに半身をずらして避けた。","translatedEnglishLine":""},{"lineNumber":154787,"originalJapaneseLine":"「おおっ！？　見た目の割に機敏だな！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Oh!? For how he looks, he's surprisingly agile!\""},{"lineNumber":154788,"originalJapaneseLine":"「シルキィ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Silky!\""},{"lineNumber":154789,"originalJapaneseLine":"「なに！？　こいつ新種の魔物じゃないのか！？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"What!? Isn't this guy some new kind of monster!?\""},{"lineNumber":154790,"originalJapaneseLine":"「シルキィ……どうして……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Silky... why...\""},{"lineNumber":154791,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"........\""},{"lineNumber":154792,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あっ、シルキィ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ah, Silky!\""},{"lineNumber":154793,"originalJapaneseLine":"サテラが話しかけた途端、","translatedEnglishLine":"The instant Satella spoke to him,"},{"lineNumber":154794,"originalJapaneseLine":"シルキィは速度を上げ、土煙の中へ消えていった。","translatedEnglishLine":"Silky accelerated and vanished into the dust cloud."},{"lineNumber":154795,"originalJapaneseLine":"「い、行っちゃ……った……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"H-He left...\""},{"lineNumber":154796,"originalJapaneseLine":"　シルキィ……なんで……」","translatedEnglishLine":"Silky... why...?\""},{"lineNumber":154797,"originalJapaneseLine":"「サテラぁぁぁー！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Satellaaa!\""},{"lineNumber":154798,"originalJapaneseLine":"「にゃああああぁあああ！？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Nyaaaaaaa!?!\""},{"lineNumber":154799,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランスが後ろからサテラの胸を","translatedEnglishLine":"Rance grabbed Satella's chest from behind with both hands."},{"lineNumber":154800,"originalJapaneseLine":"両手で鷲掴みにした。","translatedEnglishLine":""}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ふん、魔人を相手にしたんだ。
命があるだけ幸運だ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We're lucky just to be alive."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……その通りですね。
死者が出なくて本当に良かった……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's really fortunate that no one died..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「なんだと？　死者はいないのか？
たったの一人もか？」
「ええ、本当に幸運です……」
「ふむ……
シルキィって奴、実は案外強くないのか？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That Silky fellow, maybe he's not as strong as expected?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……あの馬鹿」
「ん？　なんだって？」
「……なんでもない」
「？　まあいい。
おい、シルキィはどこだ？」
「わ、分かりません……
魔人シルキィは戦線をまるで暴れうしのように
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Demon Silky has been running around the front line like a rampaging bull...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 走り回っておりますので……」
「向こうに走り去るのが
私が最後に見たシルキィの姿です……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: is the last image of Silky that I saw..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ふん、あっちか」
「追うぞ、またすぐいなくなるかも知れん」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Let's chase after him; he might disappear again soon."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「おい、そっちに魔物が向かったぞー！」
「な、なんだって！？
ここにはまだ動けない者も沢山いるのに……！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: There are still many people here who can't move...!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「戦線突破されたかな？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Did they break through the front line?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ま、関係ないし俺は行く」
「そ、そんなわけにはいかないだすよ、ランス様！」
「ひゃあ、もう来るよー！」
「えーい、どこだどこだ、シルキィちゃん！」
「さっきの兵の言ってる場所に来たのに、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "We came to the place the soldier mentioned,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 混戦状態で分からんな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: but it's a chaotic battle, so I can't tell."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「もうどこかに移動したんでしょうか……」
「ちっ、これじゃあ、見つけることなんて……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Tch, at this rate, there's no way to find him..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「シルキィ……」
「ん？　向こうが騒がしいな、
ちょっと行ってみるか」
――と、ランスが顔を向けた瞬間。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: —At the moment Rance turned his face.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 土煙の中から甲冑の塊が現れた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A mass of armored figures emerged from the dust cloud.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「先手必勝！　死ねェー！
ランスあたたたーっく！」
「くっ！」
ランスの不意打ち気味の攻撃に
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Feeling something unsettling in Rance's sudden attack,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なにか不穏なものを感じたシルキィは
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Silky avoided by shifting his body half aside instead of blocking.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 受けずに半身をずらして避けた。
「おおっ！？　見た目の割に機敏だな！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Oh!? For how he looks, he's surprisingly agile!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「シルキィ！」
「なに！？　こいつ新種の魔物じゃないのか！？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "What!? Isn't this guy some new kind of monster!?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「シルキィ……どうして……」
「あっ、シルキィ！」
サテラが話しかけた途端、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The instant Satella spoke to him,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: シルキィは速度を上げ、土煙の中へ消えていった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Silky accelerated and vanished into the dust cloud.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「い、行っちゃ……った……
シルキィ……なんで……」
「サテラぁぁぁー！」
「にゃああああぁあああ！？」
ランスが後ろからサテラの胸を
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance grabbed Satella's chest from behind with both hands.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 両手で鷲掴みにした。

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

ランスの不意打ち気味の攻撃に

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The instant Satella spoke to him,
